ComicInfo.Summary:
An odd set of heroes set in a world different from our own. In a universe that is a dirtier version of the original Detective Comic Universe. The Authority hits stands to knock your socks off. Written by Tom Peyer with spectacular artistry. Be sure to pick up this book, you will not be disappointed at all viners. This is how history was made for the current Wildstorm universe and the beginning is what set these characters on the map of success.
